title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8195 - Advisory Appraisals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8195 - Advisory Appraisals

State Regulations

Subpart 8195-1 - County Advisory Appraisals (§ 8195-1.1)

Subpart 8195-2 - State Advisory Appraisals (§ 8195-2.1 to 8195-2.4)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8195

Statutory authority: Real Property Tax Law, §§ 202[1][k], [l], 1536, 1544, 1546, 1548

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
